RegistrationTemplate.Name: Kids Holiday Club

Schedule.iCalendarContent:
BEGIN:VCALENDAR
PRODID:-//github.com/rianjs/ical.net//NONSGML ical.net 4.0//EN
VERSION:2.0
BEGIN:VEVENT
DTEND:20260113T150000
DTSTAMP:20250811T183452
DTSTART:20260113T090000
RDATE:20260114T090000,20260115T090000,20260116T090000
SEQUENCE:0
UID:278042d3-9ae0-4de8-85c3-aa8a796bb824
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR

Note:
These summer holidays, blast off into the new year and give your kids a week that’s out of this world! 

Across four days packed with games, crafts, songs, dramas, and new friends, primary aged children (5-10) will encounter the God who made the universe and loves them. It’s a safe, fun, unforgettable summer adventure that will last into eternity!
